# A branch with a base not reachable from it
# must show as needing restacking.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2024-03-30T14:59:32Z'

cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

git add foo.txt
gs bc foo -m 'Add foo'
gs down

git add bar.txt
git checkout -b bar
git commit -m 'Add bar'

# sanity check
! exists foo.txt

# track bar with foo as base.
gs branch track --base foo --verbose
stderr 'bar: needs to be restacked'

gs branch restack
stderr 'bar restacked on foo'

git log bar --decorate --oneline
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/git-log.txt

-- repo/foo.txt --
foo

-- repo/bar.txt --
bar

-- golden/git-log.txt --
20836f3 (HEAD -> bar) Add bar
c105eec (foo) Add foo
9bad92b (main) Initial commit
